smbs.config.minSpawnChance.desc: Chance for mobs to attempt to spawn with buffs at local difficulty 2.0 and below.
smbs.config.maxSpawnChance.desc: Chance for mobs to attempt to spawn with buffs at the highest possible local difficulty (6.75).
smbs.config.minChancePerBuff.desc: Chance for each applicable buff to be applied to the mob at local difficulty 2.0 and below.
smbs.config.maxChancePerBuff.desc: Chance for each applicable buff to be applied to the mob at the highest possible local difficulty (6.75).
smbs.config.enchantedBookThresholdPercen: The mob needs to have a buff level higher than this percentage of the highest possible buff level to drop an enchanted book.
smbs.config.allowBuffedMobsFromSpawners: Allow buffed mobs to spawn from mob spawners
smbs.config.buffRules.desc: Define which buffs should be applied to which mobs here. Each rule has a buff entry on the left and the list of mobs it should apply to on the right.
smbs.config.defaultMeleeBuffs.desc: These buffs will be applied if the buff set type is set to Weapon-based in the mob buff rule's buff entry and the mob is using a melee weapon.
smbs.config.defaultRangedBuffs.desc: These buffs will be applied if the buff set type is set to Weapon-based in the mob buff rule's buff entry and the mob is using a ranged weapon.
smbs.config.meleeWeapons.desc: These weapons will be checked against if the weapon type is set to Melee weapons in the mob buff rule's buff entry.
smbs.config.rangedWeapons.desc: These weapons will be checked against if the weapon type is set to Ranged weapons in the mob buff rule's buff entry.
smbs.config.buffSetType.desc: Determines which buffs will be applied to the mob.
smbs.config.customBuffs.desc: Used if Buff set type is set to Custom.
smbs.config.weaponType.desc: The weapon type required for the mob to receive buffs in this entry.
smbs.config.customWeapons.desc: Used if Weapon type is set to Custom.
smbs.buffSetType.WEAPON_BASED.desc: Applies either the default melee or default ranged buffs depending on the mob's weapon.
smbs.buffSetType.CUSTOM.desc: Applies buffs from the Custom buffs list below.
smbs.weaponType.ANY.desc: Applies the buff to the mob regardless of its weapon.
smbs.weaponType.MELEE.desc: Checks for weapons from the Melee weapons list in the config.
smbs.weaponType.RANGED.desc: Checks for weapons from the Ranged weapons list in the config.
smbs.weaponType.CUSTOM.desc: Checks for weapons from the Custom weapons list below.
